text: Sorry for my late replies now, I was busy making <https://youtu.be/wdf6S6oumH8|my 5th video>. <@UEDDR6L5Q>, thanks for letting me know about the Dion project! Like many people here, I've been enthusiastic about the potential of "structured editors" for a long time, but I had not heard about Dion specifically until now, and it seems to be more active and further along than other projects I've heard of in that category. The video gave me lots of thoughts - about the cool animated caret, the tabs vs spaces, the zooming, and the unsolved challenges mentioned towards the end. Guess I should reach out to the team with my feedback!

text: I’ve found it hard during covid to have some structure and accountability around my projects, so I’m going to try making weekly videos of what I’m working on. Here is the first one, which is kind of a “statement of intent”. Feedback welcome! <https://youtu.be/A-Uf305sddM>

attachments.title: I'm going to work on programming projects — here are my current ideas
